00028 #include "AbstractCryptStatistics.hpp"
00029 #include "CellPropertyRegistry.hpp"
00030 
00031 AbstractCryptStatistics::AbstractCryptStatistics(MeshBasedCellPopulation<2>& rCrypt)
00032     : mrCrypt(rCrypt)
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 AbstractCryptStatistics::~AbstractCryptStatistics()
00037 {
00038 }
00039 
00040 void AbstractCryptStatistics::LabelSPhaseCells()
00041 {
00042     for (AbstractCellPopulation<2>::Iterator cell_iter = mrCrypt.Begin();
00043          cell_iter != mrCrypt.End();
00044          ++cell_iter)
00045     {
00046         if (cell_iter->GetCellCycleModel()->GetCurrentCellCyclePhase()== S_PHASE)
00047         {
00048             // This should only be done for wild type cells (at the moment anyway)
00049             assert(cell_iter->GetMutationState()->IsType<WildTypeCellMutationState>());
00050 
00051             // Label this cell
00052             if (!cell_iter->HasCellProperty<CellLabel>());
00053             {
00054                 cell_iter->AddCellProperty(CellPropertyRegistry::Instance()->Get<CellLabel>());
00055             }
00056         }
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void AbstractCryptStatistics::LabelAllCellsAsHealthy()
00061 {
00062     for (AbstractCellPopulation<2>::Iterator cell_iter = mrCrypt.Begin();
00063          cell_iter != mrCrypt.End();
00064          ++cell_iter)
00065     {
00066         cell_iter->SetMutationState(CellPropertyRegistry::Instance()->Get<WildTypeCellMutationState>());
00067         cell_iter->RemoveCellProperty<CellLabel>();
00068     }
00069 }
00070 
00071 std::vector<bool> AbstractCryptStatistics::AreCryptSectionCellsLabelled(std::vector<CellPtr>& rCryptSection)
00072 {
00073     std::vector<bool> crypt_section_labelled(rCryptSection.size());
00074 
00075     for (unsigned vector_index=0; vector_index<rCryptSection.size(); vector_index++)
00076     {
00077         if (rCryptSection[vector_index]->HasCellProperty<CellLabel>())
00078         {
00079             crypt_section_labelled[vector_index] = true;
00080         }
00081         else
00082         {
00083             crypt_section_labelled[vector_index] = false;
00084         }
00085     }
00086 
00087     return crypt_section_labelled;
00088 }
